display.title: Home Brewed Potion Effects
display.description: Toss a Bone & Rotten Flesh along with any Flower, into a Boiling Cauldron to create different potion effects. The concoction cannot be bottled and simply disperses in the air [Required: 1x Bone 1x Rotten Flesh 1x Any Flower | Drop Craft With: Boiling Cauldron]
